doc.title: Flesh
doc.plot: A look at women and meat in our over-consuming society obsessed with flesh. In this idiosyncratic documentary, Tami Wilson introduces a motley crew of women with wildly differing relationships to meat. Flesh also engages the political side of meat eating. Amidst the stories and debate, a profusion of powerful images outlines how women and animals are objectified in popular culture. Punchy and instructive.
